review: Nice. I love that we can play music, do apps, games, movies, and see all our pictures/videos from the cloud. Every once in a while it is glitchy and sound is not always great, but most of the time  it works great. Love the parental controls. My kids prefer to get on Amazon fire tv instead of our normal cable! Could it improve? Probably, but it meets our needs just fine. From what I've read about other similar products- Apple tv, Roku, Google chrome, etc. this one is ahead of the pack because of all that it offers.  Probably could improve on the caliber of apps and games available, but  the concept is right on......
author: Kindle Customer

review: I bought this to replace my Matricom GBox which started acting strange after a lightning strike. All the built-in apps work great but I'm a dyed in the wool Kodi (was XBMC) user. It takes a little work to install Kodi but it's well worth it. Kodi runs beautifully. The video quality is outstanding. The controller is very nice. It's smaller than I expected but has a nice nubby feel and works well. There's no button you can use for "stop" but you can live without it. If you've a bit adventurous you can remap the keyboard. All in all, I'm very happy indeed.What a bargain!
author: John D. Hatch
